description:
Nejiru and Heybot have just established their new store, the Screw-Ya, and are abruptly visited by wannabe main characters Moeru, Kathleena, and Suchat. They decide to VocaBattle for the title, but Nejiru loses easily due to missing a key screw! Could the mysterious, ghostly Yuko be the key to getting the impact their gags are lacking?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Scary-Scary! It`s My First Scary Story!
コワコワ~, はじめてのコワ話
